snippet.title: Kena: Bridge Of Spirits Presentation | Tribeca Games Spotlight 2021
snippet.description: The developers at Ember Labs speak on their background in Hollywood animation, and the influence of playing action adventure games growing up, and how that's impacted the direction of Kena: Bridge Of Spirits. In this featurette during the Tribeca Game Spotlight, they elaborate on the game's score, and cinematic quality.
